snippet.title: Tangles - Launch Trailer | FREE Mystery Horror Game
snippet.description:
🕒 BEHIND EVERY HOUR, LIE HOURS.

Tangles is out on December 21, 2023 on Epic Games Store FOR FREE!
https://store.epicgames.com/p/tangles-e99298

In the heart of an isolated island, a deserted camp sets the stage for a mysterious military operation. A squad of 8 soldiers arrive for this mission.
During the first days of training for the mission, Soldier Basel sustains a serious injury that leads him to a month-long coma. Upon awakening, he discovers a startling reality – all soldiers have vanished, leaving behind a trail of enigmatic secrets.
Basel commences a journey filled with puzzles and challenges in an attempt to uncover the secrets surrounding the mysterious disappearance of his colleagues and discover the secrets of the mysterious mission.

#Tangles #Horror #Mystery #PCGames

Follow us on Twitter for the latest updates:

🔗 Hamad Al-Humaidan: https://twitter.com/xHamad_
🔗 Saad Al-Humaidan: https://twitter.com/s3d_bay
🔗 Saham Studio: https://twitter.com/SahamStudio
🌐 Website: https://www.sahamstudio.com/


Support me from here, thanks ! 
https://streamlabs.com/corazon-Jq20jj


📧 Contact us:
contact@sahamstudio.com
HamadSulaiman2023@gmail.com
saadalhomidan@gmail.com

Music:
Creepy Little Girl Singing - by Lara Sluyter (LARA’S HORROR SOUNDS on YouTube) ✔
